definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: These things she did without a word and without being commanded to do them.
sentences.chinese: 這些活計，她總是一聲不響地去幹，沒有誰支使她。

sentences.english: He gave a toast at the party and with that he sat there with no sound.
sentences.chinese: 他做完祝酒辭，然後一聲不響地坐在那裏。

sentences.english: But the man followed me, wordlessly continuing to hit me.
sentences.chinese: 但這個男的還是跟着我，一聲不響地繼續打我。

sentences.english: Sitting there dumbly, tears trickled down her face.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那裏一聲不響，淚水順着面頰流下來。

sentences.english: To make a continuous low-pitched buzzing or humming sound.
sentences.chinese: 傑克做事總是一聲不響的。

sentences.english: Dickie left the shop without a word.
sentences.chinese: 迪克一聲不響地離開了商店。

sentences.english: The Thenardier silently handed him the folded bill.
sentences.chinese: 德納第大娘，一聲不響，把那賬單遞給他。

sentences.english: The cat crept silently towards the bird.
sentences.chinese: 那貓一聲不響地爬向那隻鳥。

sentences.english: When she was frightened she darted noiselessly like a kingfisher .
sentences.chinese: 她受驚的時候，就像一隻一聲不響地急投疾槍的翠鳥。

sentences.english: She closed the door very quietly, as she was afraid of wakening the sleeper.
sentences.chinese: 她一聲不響地把門關上，生怕吵醒那個睡覺的人。

sentences.english: The old people sat on the bench, still as statues.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個老人坐在座位上，仍像雕像一樣一聲不響。

sentences.english: The children watched the conjuror in silent wonder.
sentences.chinese: 孩子都一聲不響驚奇地看著魔術師。

sentences.english: Phyl was still looking silently and insertly on.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾還是一聲不響地呆呆地看着。

sentences.english: This man, without uttering a word, had seized the handle of the bucket which she was carrying.
sentences.chinese: 那漢子，一聲不響，抓住了她手裏的水桶的提樑。

sentences.english: Quietly Mark poured and served drinks for all of them.
sentences.chinese: 馬克一聲不響地給他們每人倒好飲料並端上來。

sentences.english: The children watched the conjuror in silent wonder.
sentences.chinese: 孩子都一聲不響驚奇地看着魔術師。
